WorkItem.Description:
On both DK modules, the browser hang out when selecting the gear>trinket dropdown menu or when selecting a DK model with the trinket list selected.
 
There is no error messages, other models and slots seems to work.
 
The issue is present on rev 56126 with both Firefox and IE8.

Comments.Message:
I'm assuming you're using a local build?  I did some work on the special effects parser that should have it working based on the rev. you mention.  
Which set of data do you have for it to pull from?  Debug or Release? (might be something in the release build or in your data set that isn't in mine)

Yes I'm using local builds made with visual studio 2010. I'm not very used to .net and silverlight so I'm not sure what you mean by "data set". I've just a svn repos. I've triied to build with the debug and release configuration with the same result.
I'm not asking for a tutorial for building it correctly, so if you think it's related to my build, just close the issue and I'll try to be patient waiting for the next beta release !

nope... everything is probably fine on our end.  My data was old, still only had pre-Cata gear in it.  I found a use-case where swingtime can become zero can cause issues.  I'll do some more testing tomorrow and check in the fix.
Thank you for your defect. :)
